summary: This mod adds cave story characters, to the best I can make them.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add cave story characters to at the moment, the bannered mare. As of right now, they are just npcs, but i will eventually make them followers as well. So far i have Quote, Curly Brace, and Sue Sakamato(human form). I am making them to look like they are in cave story, the best I can. I will also be making a building in whiterun for them all, at a later date. I also made Quote and Curly Brace husband and wife.This mod is also my first mod.

Even though they are yet to be followers, there stats are:

Quote: level 81, Combat ranger
Curly Brace: level 81, Combat ranger
Sue Sakamoto: Level 41, Combet Rogue

Mod required:
ApachiiSkyHair:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168
You must have this or, the characters will be bald.

Pics will be coming soon.

All credit for the characters goes to Pixel.
Please leave a comment telling how you like this mod. And remember I am a complete and utter newbie at mods.
author: MegamanOmega91
